participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and reflective, Emily tends to be sentimental and values her relationships deeply.
participant_1.background: I had to put my dog down. I aspire to be a millionaire. I watch every football game at Alabama. I prefer the simpler times. I like to go on long hikes.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and free-spirited, Jake enjoys expressing himself through music and values his independence.
participant_2.background: I used to only play covers, but now I write my own songs. I'm doing well at school, but I miss my dad a lot. I would not be able to weld if I was blind because I need to see the metal I am welding. I eat junk food. I'm not married, I enjoy my freedom and the thrill of competition.

content.text: I had to put my dog down a few months ago and I'm still having a hard time with it.
I'm so sorry to hear that. I know how hard it is to lose a pet. I had to put my dog down a few years ago and I still miss him every day.
Thanks for the kind words. It's been a rough few months.
I can imagine. I'm here for you if you need anything.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go on long hikes, watch football, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to write songs, play music, and weld.
I used to play music, but I don't have much time for it anymore.
That's too bad. Music is a great way to express yourself.
Maybe you can start playing again sometime.
You should. It's a lot of fun.
What's your favorite kind of music to listen to?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly listen to country music.
